desc: The one-stop centre for your DIY Personal Care Ingredients & Therapeutic Crafts needs! Essential oil, carrier oil, silicone molds, tools, soap bases, soywax, beeswax, palm wax and more. Get all your raw ingredients and tools for soap making, candle making, bath bomb supplies, epoxy resin & more. Quality guaranteed.
